alert.note: Alert for Bexar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 27 at 3:27PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bexar County through 415 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shavano Park, or 8 miles northwest of San Antonio Int Airport, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Leon Valley, Helotes, Shavano Park, Hollywood Park, Cross Mountain, Leon Springs, The Dominion, Timberwood Park, Government Canyon State Natural Area, Castle Hills, Hill Country Village, Grey Forest, Fiesta Texas, and Scenic Oaks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
